* Active contributer on Ubuntu related forums and recent AskUbuntu member
* Proposed a Patch for Ubuntu 12.10 Quantal, Make xchat-indicator an "Enhance:" against the xchat package (<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xchat-indicator/+bug/1049194/|Bug # 1049194]]</nowiki>)
